thread.title: Chibi-Robo! Zip Lash for 3DS gets a release date and new trailer - Gaming
thread.title_full: Chibi-Robo! Zip Lash for 3DS gets a release date and new trailer - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Albaraa Fahmy
title: Chibi-Robo! Zip Lash for 3DS gets a release date and new trailer - Gaming
text: Nintendo 3DS owners will be able to get their hands on Chibi-Robo! Zip Lash when it launches on November 6.In addition to announcing the release date, Nintendo has unveiled a new trailer of the upcoming side-scrolling platformer - giving an overview of what players can expect to find in the title."With colourful graphics, accessible game play and a loveable main character, Chibi-Robo! Zip Lash is perfect for every member of the family," said Nintendo of America's Scott Moffitt in a statement."It is a terrific addition to the robust series of fun Nintendo games launching between now and the end of year."In Chibi-Robo! Zip Lash, Chibi-Robo can use his plug and cord to whip, grapple and swing his way through worlds filled with enemies and environmental puzzles.He can also collect boost balls, which extend his cord and allow him to access different areas and search for a variety of collectibles.The game was announced during a pre-E3 Nintendo Direct presentation earlier this year.Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
